mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `t_user`(user_id, user_email, user_password, user_nickname, user_create_time) VALUES (#{user.id}, #{user.email}, #{user.password}, #{user.nickname}, #{user.createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT t.user_email, t.user_online, t.user_img, t.user_nickname FROM t_user t LEFT JOIN t_github_user github ON github.github_user_id = #{githubId}
SELECT t.user_img AS `image`, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_shopcar car WHERE car.car_user_id = t.user_id ) AS `count` FROM t_user t
